feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.0
entry.content:
### WARNING! Breaking Change - Since it uses databases, it will require a full RE-set up! There are no more jsons!

If you need to back to an older version of huntarr, use huntarr:huntarr:7.8.2. You will not lose your data if you downgrade (Huntarr v8 does not wipe your prior jsons)

The Main Change - [Huntarr] Entire Huntarr runs on 3 database now, no more jsons

In Addition - [Huntarr] Made the icon clickable to Huntarr.io - [Huntarr] Lots of rewrites to make it work all with the databases - [Apps] API Caps per App is 250 (to help prevent abuse and protect the user) - [Apps] Displays minutes instead of seconds - [Apps] User cannot save sleep settings below 10 minutes - [Apps] Prevent saving negative numbers in the apps form - [Apps] When an instance is executing, it will stop once it hit the max api count (will not finish the operatoin) - [History] No longer shows show many missing epsodies in the title - [Logs] Removed useless and tons of spammy logs - [Logs] Further fixed timezone issues - [Stateful Management] Convert to global world time instead of US AM/PM - [Swaparr] Swaparr field unselectable if swaparr is disabled for each app - [Swaparr] New option (off by default) that can blacklist and item and re-search for it again (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/597) - [Swaparr] New option (off by default) automatically detect failed imports, blocklist them, and search for alternatives

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.8.0...8.0.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.1
entry.content:
• Huntarr for Windows now supports Apprise (Request: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/584)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.0.0...8.0.1

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.2
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Fixed 2FA
  • [Huntarr] Setup - 2FA now has a copy function to make it easier for password manager setup
  • [Huntarr] Added several more time zones to help users and fixed custom ones added (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/610)
  • [Huntarr] User mode shows up regardless of authentication setting (enough protections in place now)
  • [Lidarr] Removed duplicate additional options
  • [Readarr] Moved additional options to the bottom
  • [Whisparr v2 & v3] Removed the duplicate additonal options
  • [Swaparr] Updated docs (thanks @smalitro - interrupted his TV time j/k) and provided this information and huntarr was updated accordingly [Also in my case i found that adding the extentions .vob .iso .mdf .msi .arj and .ace to the Malicious File Extensions list helped to cut down on these further. I also added .001 .rar .zip, to remove the password protected files and zip bombs all to common on some public anonymouse trackers… This cut my failed imports down from 30% to less than 5%…]

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.0.1...8.0.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.3
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Huntarr now only utilizes one database and that is huntarr.db
  • [Huntarr] Synology has a different way of handling sqlite, so added fixes to assist (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/615)
  • [Huntarr] Fixed - Logs Show selector not sticky (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/613)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.0.2...8.0.3
